verses.roman:
mādhava-saundarya dekhi' āviṣṭa ha-ilā
aṅganete āsi' preme nācite lāgilā

synonyms: mādhava-saundarya dekhi'-after seeing the beauty of Lord Bindu Mādhava; āviṣṭa ha-ilā—became ecstatic in love; aṅganete āsi'-coming to the courtyard; preme—in great love; nācite lāgilā—began to dance.
translation: Upon reaching the temple of Bindu Mādhava, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, seeing the beauty of Lord Bindu Mādhava, became overwhelmed in ecstatic love. He then began to dance in the courtyard of the temple.
